DOC.brief_summary: An observational trial aiming to verify whether does any relationship exist between renal resistive index and postoperative outcome in major high risk surgery
DOC.brief_title: RENAL RESISTIVE INDEX POST-OPERATIVE COMPLICATIONS IN MAJOR SURGERY?
DOC.detailed_description: Renal resistive index was measured just after major high risk operations and then patients were observed searching for any surgical and medical-related complications during the first post-operative week
DOC.criteria: age > 18 years major surgical operations age < 18 years
